meanings: (사물을) gather, (수집하다) collect, (자료 등을) amass, (오랜 기간에 걸쳐) accumulate
식후의 표현 They collect the trash today.
식후의 표현 Today is trash collection day.
O형에 관한 표현 You are the type who steadily builds a fortune.
